name: Defogger for Australis (default colours)
description: You can use this theme to make the top border deffoged. It doesn't change any colours, so sometimes some elements might be invisible.
additional_info: You can change in the source the value of opacity between 0 and 1, which equal 0% and 100%, for example you want 30% tranparent bar, you should change the value to 0.7 (because opacity is the oposite of transparency, default 90%, which equals 0.1 opacity). It should work on Windows Vista/7, probably not on Windows 8 and higher.
